channel.title: Defensive Stance
channel.description: [s]I don't like the way the Defensive Stance looks at all in my server when you get attacked. It looks really ugly and im trying to figure this out/find on web but i can't seem to find anything. Any help is appreciated and im using a 317 PI server [/s] Fixed
